article: The children often play soccer in the garden . Sometimes they break Mrs . Smith ' s windows . One afternoon , Mrs . Smith is reading a newspaper at home . After a short time , she closes her eyes and goes to _ At that time a little boy knocks at the door . Mrs . Smith opens the door and asks , " Do you break my windows again ? " " Oh , no " , says the boy . " Your windows are open this time and our soccer is in your room . Can I get it back , please ? " , .
